---
title: "Smoky Halloumi Pasta Bake"
author: "Emily Leary"
categories: [pasta]
---

- 300g pasta
- 2 cloves garlic
- 1 onion
- 2 tsp smoky paprika
- 250g halloumi
- 1 large courgette
- 150g cheddar
- 2 tins chopped tomatos

1. Preheat oven 180 fan
1. Cook pasta for 5 minutes and drain
1. Fry onion, garlic and 1 tsp paprika
1. Add cubed halloumi & courgette
1. Put pasta, chopped tomatos and veg in a baking tin
1. Topped with grated cheese and 1 tsp paprika
1. Bake for 10 minutes
